about_the_game:
Sancticide is a melee-driven TPP action game with rogue-lite elements set in the bleak aftermath of a stalled biblical Apocalypse. Its combat system emphasizes spatial and directional awareness, blending the strategic depth of classic games with modern mechanics. Players can leverage environmental manipulation and physical interactions to unlock diverse tactical opportunities in every battle.

In this prologue, you’ll explore a desolate world torn apart by biblical calamity, where divine bureaucracy and human stubbornness have stalled the End of Days. Assume the mantle of Ezechiel, a newly minted Sin Collector, tasked with enforcing the will of Them at The Top.

  • Dynamic Dueling in the End Times: dive into battles that blend old-school arena fighter intensity with modern third-person action mechanics fueled by the chaos of the biblical end times.

  • Strategic Chaos: use the scorched remnants of the world to your advantage—slam enemies into hellish hazards, crush them with debris, and reshape the battlefield to survive.

  • Heavenly Arsenal: Wield sacred melee weapons, unholy ranged gear, and the divine power of "Purple" to craft a combat style worthy of a Sin Collector in the apocalypse.


Wield the Purple Powers, a divine force that allows:

  • Kinetic manipulation of objects and enemies.

  • Passive enhancements to boost your survivability.

  • Active abilities to alter time, perception, or devastate foes.

  • Battle against various foes with distinct appearances, movement styles, and weaknesses.

  • Encounter Sinners and Debtors, mortals marked for divine judgment, and outwit or overpower Proselytes - fanatical minions of Them at The Top.

The idea of Kosherness assumes that all items and beings belong to one of two categories: Kosher (acceptable for Them at The Top) or unkosher (unacceptable).

Death in Sancticide is never a simple punishment. It allows the player to better understand the persistent world's rules and adjust their approach with each run. Each defeat is a chance to strengthen yourself, refine your strategy, and explore the mysteries of the stalled Apocalypse.

  • Explore the opening level of Sancticide, introducing its distinct mechanics, unique lore, and gripping combat.

  • Experiment with customizing your playstyle using weapons, powers, and upgrades.

  • Get a taste of the dark humor and epic struggles that define this biblical apocalypse.

    Explore and learn the rules governing the world of the biblical Apocalypse, which is filled with agony, suffering, and struggle, with a glimmer of hope and humanity in the least expected places.

    Download the demo now and step into a shattered world where every battle tests your resolve. Will you uphold the will of the divine—or forge your destiny in the chaos?


Please note that this demo represents an early look at Sancticide and does not reflect the game's final version. We continually refine the gameplay, mechanics, performance, and visuals to ensure the best possible experience upon full release. Thank you for your support during our development journey!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-7400 / Ryzen 3 2200G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1060 6GB / AMD RX 590
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-9700K / Ryzen 7 2700
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce RTX 2070 8GB / AMD RX 5700
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SSD recommended

short_description: Become Ezechiel, sin collector in service of Them at The Top, as he ventures through what is left of our world during the End Times. It's the Apocalypse, and his job is to eradicate sin for the glory of God. But can a mere human endure such a fate?
supported_languages:
English*, Polish
*languages with full audio support
